WorkItem.Description:
How to reproduce:
Make sure calculation mode interpolation is being used
Load up a character in Retribution model
Add special effect 632 AP, Trigger PhysicalCrit, 15% chance, 45s CD.
Â 
It is then calling Rawr.SpecialEffect.GetAverageStats(float triggerInterval = 1.39778626, float triggerChance = 1.0, float attackSpeed = 3.4, float fightDuration = 300.0) which Interpolation set on.

Comments.Message: Ah ha, so there is something screwy with the special effect editor (I will fix that later) that it won't always edit the special effect correctly. The problem occurs when the chance is set to 100%.
The error occurs when you have a proc that has a cooldown longer then its duration, a 100% proc chance, and have it set to use the interpolation.
